title: poster2json: Machine Actionable Poster Extraction
description: A tool for extracting structured metadata from scientific posters, converting visual poster content into machine-actionable JSON format. Part of the posters.science platform for FAIR scientific poster discovery and sharing.

creators.name: O'Neill, James
creators.affiliation: FAIR Data Innovations Hub, California Medical Innovations Institute, San Diego, CA, USA

creators.name: Portillo, Dorian
creators.affiliation: FAIR Data Innovations Hub, California Medical Innovations Institute, San Diego, CA, USA

creators.name: Soundarajan, Sanjay
creators.affiliation: FAIR Data Innovations Hub, California Medical Innovations Institute, San Diego, CA, USA

creators.name: Patel, Bhavesh
creators.affiliation: FAIR Data Innovations Hub, California Medical Innovations Institute, San Diego, CA, USA

notes: Funding: The Navigation Fund - Poster Sharing and Discovery Made Easy with Posters.science. Validated on 10 manually annotated scientific posters with 90% passing rate. Average metrics: word_capture=0.964, ROUGE-L=0.880, number_capture=0.914.
